alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Southern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Northern Lake County; Orange; Osceola; Seminole; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued May 02 at 5:44PM EDT until May 03 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...HIGH FIRE DANGER EXPECTED ACROSS NORTHERN EAST CENTRAL FLORIDA WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND BREEZY CONDITIONS ACROSS NORTHERN EAST CENTRAL FLORIDA... The National Weather Service in Melbourne has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Wednesday afternoon through Wednesday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Volusia, Lake, Seminole, Orange, Brevard, and Osceola counties. * WINDS...West 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Minimum values of 25 to 35 percent. * IMPACTS...
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
